name: Elementaur Demo 1.0 (x64 bit)
description:
Hey everyone! I am the owner/founder of the CodeKeys community.  We are working On a large commercial game called Elementaur. I have completed designing 2 levels for the game. The game is 100% Legit. 100% free. In order to play the game, all you have to do is :
1.) Download the file.

2.) Open the file(which is an installer)

3.) Run through the installation to install it.

Here join our discord server: https://discord.io/codekeys+
